bill_title: Honoring the players and coaches of the 2002 Flandreau 13-14 Teener Baseball Team.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the players and coaches of the 2002 Flandreau 13-14 Teener Baseball Team. WHEREAS, the Flandreau 13-14 Teener Baseball Team won the South Dakota State 13-14 Teener Baseball Tournament; and WHEREAS, pitchers Bret Severtson and Tanner Harris be commended for their outstanding pitching performances throughout the state tournament; and WHEREAS, players Kyle Sanderson, Matt Johanson, Ben Hendrickson, Drew Weber, Alex Rosheim, and Matt Porish be recognized for their offensive efforts in the batter's box; and WHEREAS, Ryan Warner, Wes Jepsen, Bret Lueck, Ben Pray, Chase Amdahl, Daniel Warner, Mitch Hansen, Logan Rose, and Owen Parsley also be commended for their contributions to an outstanding season; and WHEREAS, coaches Gary Christensen, Tom Hansen, Charlie Rosheim, and Dean Harris' leadership inspired excellent teamwork and sportsmanship: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the 2002 Flandreau 13-14 Teener Baseball Team be recognized for its memorable 2002 championship season.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the players and coaches of the 2002 Flandreau 13-14 Teener Baseball Team. WHEREAS, the Flandreau 13-14 Teener Baseball Team won the South Dakota State 13-14 Teener Baseball Tournament; and WHEREAS, pitchers Bret Severtson and Tanner Harris be commended for their outstanding pitching performances throughout the state tournament; and WHEREAS, players Kyle Sanderson, Matt Johanson, Ben Hendrickson, Drew Weber, Alex Rosheim, and Matt Porish be recognized for their offensive efforts in the batter's box; and WHEREAS, Ryan Warner, Wes Jepsen, Bret Lueck, Ben Pray, Chase Amdahl, Daniel Warner, Mitch Hansen, Logan Rose, and Owen Parsley also be commended for their contributions to an outstanding season; and WHEREAS, coaches Gary Christensen, Tom Hansen, Charlie Rosheim, and Dean Harris' leadership inspired excellent teamwork and sportsmanship: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the 2002 Flandreau 13-14 Teener Baseball Team be recognized for its memorable 2002 championship season.
